answers.answer: I am not really sure if this will help much but my grandmother was 58 yrs old when this started happening to her, and she had diabetes as well.  She thought maybe that had something to do with it.  She went to the doctor several times over it and they told her that it was bc of her weight. After several failed attempts she went to another doctor and they told her she had gout and bone spurs which caused severe pain and swollen ankle and foot.  The doctor told her to watch the foods she ate bc it triggered the swelling and pain.  Hope this helps.
